data.title: Garrison Brothers Distillery
data.meta_description: Join us for an exciting Bourbon 101 class with Master Distiller Donnis Todd and Sims Holliday, as we delve into the remarkable evolution of the world’s most wondrous whiskey: bourbon.
data.text:
Ryan Jones began his music career at the age of 5, taking piano lessons from his mother and continuing his musical education into his teens with guidance from Darrel DeCounter, John Anderson’s keyboard player. By 18, he had picked up the acoustic guitar and started writing music with his college roommates.

After spending 22 years as a Manager and Director of Operations at luxury resorts across the southeast US, including Horseshoe Bay Resort in Texas, Ryan decided to return to his passion for music in 2018. He officially began performing in late 2019.

Primarily a country artist, Ryan plays both original songs and covers from artists such as Kenny Chesney, Morgan Wallen, and Garth Brooks. Ryan loves sharing his music with others and has performed at various venues, including restaurants, bars, breweries, and private events throughout Texas and the southwest.

This concert is free and open to the public. See y’all there!

Hye Fashioned Takeover is back, y’all!

Celebrate Bourbon Heritage Month with our nationwide Hye Fashioned Takeover from September 1st to September 30th, where hundreds of bars and restaurants across the country elevate the classic Old Fashioned with Garrison Brothers Bourbon, showcasing their mixology mastery.

But it isn’t just about celebrating all things bourbon, the goal of Hye Fashioned Takeover is to help raise funds for Boot Campaign, a non-profit organization that honors and restores the lives of veterans and military families through individualized, life-improving programs. You can help raise funds by posting a picture of the featured Garrison Brothers Old Fashioned at participating bars or restaurants on Instagram Stories, following both Garrison Brothers Distillery and Boot Campaign Instagram handles, and using the hashtag #hyefashioned with the post. For every post, we will donate $5 to Boot Campaign. In addition to the donations, each post will be entered to win a one-of-a-kind Garrison Brothers Distillery prize package which includes a trip to Austin for a distillery visit for four guests, a two-night hotel stay, and tickets to a Moody Center concert of the winner’s choosing.

To find a participating location near you, check out our map locator on hyefashioned.com

If you can’t make it to a participating bar or restaurant, not to worry! There will be a Hye Fashioned Takeover at Home kit for sale on our e-commerce page that comes with Garrison Brothers Old Fashioned Sugar Cubes + 750 ML bottle of Garrison Brothers Small Batch Bourbon for $84.99. For every kit sold, $5 will be donated to Boot Campaign. Home bar aficionados and bourbon lovers that are over 21 years of age and in America are invited to participate by making their own Old Fashioneds using Garrison Brothers Bourbon.

We can’t wait for you to join us for this month-long celebration as we raise our glasses to unforgettable moments and create a lasting impact beyond the final sip!

Erica Daniels’ music blends Folk, Electro-Acoustic, and Rock influences into a distinctive sound, rooted in her upbringing in Austin, TX, where “The Beaus” were formed.

Erica’s musical journey began in childhood with air guitar and evolved with piano lessons and guitar playing before college. After graduating from Texas A&M, she embarked on her songwriting path, culminating in the release of her first acoustic album in 2018.

Erica Daniels’ music resonates with life’s memories and emotions, offering a personal yet universally relatable perspective. Her style is both unique and familiar, drawing inspiration from life’s journeys, including stories of love, heartbreak, and encounters along the way.

This concert is free and open to the public. See y’all there!

James Hearne, a stalwart of Philadelphia’s indie rock scene, has carved a path as a rock journeyman with his powerhouse vocals and woodsy guitars.

Former frontman for bands like The Sobriquets and The Way Home, James recently traded the Hudson Valley for the vibrant Austin music scene. His debut LP, “Through Private Wars,” is a testament to his life on the road, capturing the essence of endless travels, deep love, dodgy choices, and hard-living.

Drawing comparisons to the likes of Jason Isbell, Sturgill Simpson, and Ryan Adams, Hearne’s music blends soulful steel-sliding barn-burners with intimate, brittle ballads. His songwriting and dynamic performances have earned him recognition as a notable singer-songwriter talent. With a sound that feels both timeless and deeply personal, Hearne’s work invites listeners into his world, demanding repeated listens on long drives and quiet nights.

This concert is free and open to the public. See y’all there!

The Coveted Cowboy Bourbon

We are delighted to invite you to our highly anticipated Distillery Release event for the 10th anniversary Cowboy Bourbon on September 21st at 8am, our most prized and coveted release of all time. Un-cut and un-filtered, this true Texas bourbon has spent at least six scorching hot summers in our barrel barn, soaking up every ounce of rich, bold flavor. This sweet, powerful nectar embodies Texas in every drop, delivering an experience that’s as big and unforgettable as the Lone Star State itself.

Coming in at a mighty 140.2 proof, this bourbon is not for the faint of heart. It’s a powerhouse, a testament to the craftsmanship and patience that goes into every bottle. Whether you’re a seasoned bourbon aficionado or a newcomer eager to taste the spirit of Texas, the 2024 Cowboy Bourbon is worth every penny. So saddle up and grab your bottle before it’s gone—this is one you won’t want to miss.

#DrinkTexasBourbon

Join us for a Bourbon Pairing Dinner at Macallans Public House with Nancy Garrison, co-hosted by Boot Campaign in support of the Hye Fashioned Takeover. Savor an unforgettable five-course meal, expertly paired with Garrison Brothers Bourbon. Don’t miss this one-of-a-kind evening, where you’ll also have the unique opportunity to purchase and hand dip your own bottle of Small Batch and take part in an end-of-evening auction, with all proceeds going to The Boot Campaign. Tickets are priced at $125 per person.

To reserve tickets, email Gm@MacallansPub.com OR call (714) 332-0006

Family Style Menu

1st Course

-Watermelon Caprese Salad

Paired with HoneyDew Welcome Cocktail

2nd Course

-Hawaiian Chicken Skewers

Paired with Small Batch Neat

3rd Course

-Beef Ribs with Cajun Corn on the Cob

Paired with Single Barrel Neat

4th Course

-Brisket with Macaroni Salad and Baked Beans

Paired with Balmorhea Neat

Dessert

-Smores

Paired with Laguna Madre Neat

We can’t wait to see y’all there. Salud!

14 BADASS TEXAS CHEFS, 7 LIVE FIRE STEAK DISHES & 5 GARRISON BROTHERS BOURBON COCKTAILS

Howdy y’all! Saddle up and get ready for the most mouthwatering showdown this side of the Mississippi. We’ve partnered with theBeef Loving Texans to bring you the second annual Garrison Brothers Hye Steaks Challenge! But this isn’t just an event; it’s a celebration of the finest flavors Texas has to offer, featuring a cookoff between chefs from all over the Lone Star State.

Your ticket to this unforgettable evening includes samples of 7 different steak dishes crafted by 14 of Texas’ top chefs, as well as 5 unique Garrison Brothers Bourbon cocktails. And that’s not all—enjoy complimentary wine, live music, a raffle, and entertainmentthat’ll have you hollerin’ for more.

And here’s the kicker: All proceeds will benefit the Texas Restaurant Foundation. So come on out and join us—let’s show the world how good bourbon and good folks can change the world!
